plot: John discusses the sudden disappearance of sports due to coronavirus, how their absence is impacting people emotionally and financially, and the complications of bringing them back anytime soon.

In the latest installment of coronavirus series John Oliver puts light on the current absence of all major sports due to COVID-19 outbreak. The lack of professional sport events is taking its toll on countless people emotionally and financially. He also points out difficulties to start any initiative without proper planning and precautions. That is the show is sponsoring the Marble League to give people the thrill of sports.—Niaz Islam Arif
